version_description: Welcome to the world of Might & Magic: Elemental Guardians! Collect, train and battle hundreds of elemental creatures as a Hero of Ashan! Help us improve with your feedback by leaving a review or sending an email!

Heroes, take revenge on your foes!
• New Arena Battle Log - check who attacked you, and challenge them back!
• Fast Battle Mode - a much QUICKER way to attack dungeons continuously
• 3 New Glyphs Types - new combinations and strategies available
• Lots of bug fixes, performance and interface improvements
Help us improve with your feedback by leaving a review, or by contacting us directly on Social Media!

Complete the story, conquer the towers, trade in your parts, and chat!
• Tower of Trials – two excruciatingly difficult towers to test your mettle over waves of enemies!
• Final Story Region – enter the Wastelands and face the final Boss
• Chat System – following high demand, players can now interact via the chat
• Creature Shop – Exchange your hard-earned creature fragments for brand new allies
Help us improve by leaving a review, or by contacting us directly on Social Media!

Greetings Heroes!
The Event Interface has been redesigned and now sits proudly in the Akadimia main menu! Access it to:
• Consult on-going events and fresh challenges
• See upcoming events and plan your journey in advance!
The skill set of specific Creatures has also been adjusted (full changelist in Forums).
And of course, we've made various performance improvements and bug fixes!
